dev-1.x.name: drupal/shiv

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Sub(Child) theme of Beginning. As a initial starting point for Drupal theme development. Beginning theme update, improve frequently. So it is not advisable to make changes or edit Beginning theme . Shiv theme created to serve customizable theme with power of "Beginning theme". And we are not going to change/update this sub(Child) theme. Theme is develop by Shivcharan Patil(Shiv). Theme developer is also available at itApplication.net or email at shiv@itweb.in to customize this theme or create/develop entirely new theme as per your requirements.
